translation: I am the goal, the supporter, the Lord, the witness, the abode, the shelter, the friend, the origin, the dissolution, the foundation, the treasure-house, and the imperishable seed.
commentary: 9.18 Speed the goal? Bharta the supporter? Lord: the Lord? Sakshi the witness? dwelling the abode? Sharanam the shelter? Friend the friend? Prabhavah the origin? Pralaya the dissolution? Location the foundation? Nidhanam the treasurehouse? The seed the seed? The infinitive is imperishable.Commentary I am the goal? the fruit of action. He who nourishes and supports is the huand. I am the witness of the good and evil actions
